short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that generates music and sings the content of a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every webpage has a song in its heart. Let it out by pointing and clicking at the text you would like to hear.

Activate and deactivate the extension by clicking the extension icon.

When the extension is activated, double-click links and buttons to activate them.

Deactivate to reset single-click action on links and buttons.
